sentences.sContent: Hundreds of moths flew against the lighthouse windows.
sentences.sContent_eng: Hundreds of moths flew against the lighthouse windows.
sentences.sCn: 数以千计的飞蛾扑向灯塔的窗子。

sentences.sContent: The land on which the lighthouse stands has been in the Newman family for generations.
sentences.sContent_eng: The land on which the lighthouse stands has been in the Newman family for generations.
sentences.sCn: 纽曼家族拥有包括灯塔在内的这片土地，传到现在已经有好几代了。

sentences.sContent: On our last day, the hotel manager gave me a map of the island, marking the old church, the lighthouse and a pirate cemetery.
sentences.sContent_eng: On our last day, the hotel manager gave me a map of the island, marking the old church, the lighthouse and a pirate cemetery.
sentences.sCn: 在我们离开的那天，酒店的经理送给我们一张地图，上面标注了这里古老的教堂、灯塔和海盗公墓。

trans.tranOther: a tower with a powerful flashing light that guides ships away from danger
